Related Character(s): 枷
Связанный символ (и): 枷

耞字的基本解释

耞
jiā
〔连耞〕拍打谷物、使子粒脱落下来的农具，由一个长柄和一排竹条或木条构成。

耞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiā］
［《集韻》居牙切，平麻，見。］
即连枷。一种脱粒用的农具。

耞字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耒字部】　耞； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页963第10
【集韻】【韻會】?居牙切，音嘉。【說文】柫也。本作枷。今作耞。【廣韻】連耞，打穀具。淮南謂之柍。

耞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
耞字的起名意思

暂无。

flail
Basic explanation of words
flail
jiā
[Lian 耞] A farm tool used to slap grains to make the grains fall off. It consists of a long handle and a row of bamboo or wooden strips.
flail
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiā］
["Jiyun" is cut in teeth, plain hemp, see. ]
That is flail. A farm tool used for threshing.
flail
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Lei Character Department] 　耞; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 963 No. 10
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ju Yaqie, Yinjia. [Said the text] Yuya. This is a flail. This is the last. [Guang Yun] Lian Di, threshing tools. Huainan is called the 柍.
